title: Patcher not opening for some reason or another...
body:
I recently had some malware related issues and while I'm sure it probably isn't relevant now I downloaded Avast and about thirty minutes ago (give or take) I was made aware of an issue where LoL wasn't opening due to Avast blocking it. As stated I'm not really thinking this is the issue anymore at this point due to the fact that..
1. This was approximately 7 months ago.
2. I ran a scan on LoL (both in the directories and strait up just the desktop icon) and no issues were reported.
What is happening is basically, I double click the LoL desktop shortcut, the icon shows up then disappears, finally the computer acts as if its loading for about 3 second then stops. I looked in the task manager to see if possibly it was loading and I was being impatient and what I'm seeing is that the process is launching for a quick second or two then closing on it's own. 
I'm not the most savvy with computers ever so if I could get some help that would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
Hop into your installation directory which should be located here: (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)

Right-click on the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file and select *run as administrator*. Let me know if this helped resolve your issue. ^.^
Thank you very much but I've tried that and it didn't work. However on the bright side I've reinstalled and the issue resolved it self.
